resources.string:
MnemR
Often times computers store things for humans and remind them at time. MnemR is about the other way around: helping people remember things themselves in the human memory. Continious repetition with visual and auditive anchors (mnemonics) aid the process by making things more sticky in long-term memory. MnemR (pron. - Nehmer -) is a mnemonic content learning tool for the android platform designed to enable all kinds of human memory trainer applications..
